Description: Sherd of North Ionian (possibly Tean) pottery lid with part of flange; ridges on top around lost knob and at turn to rim; pale slip; interior reserved; exterior, from centre: wide black band on moulded ring; frieze of scales with black dot inside each; wide black band on plastic ridge at junction of lid body and rim; black band on top thick flat rim and series of short vertical dashes on edge. Drilled for clay sample.
Curator's comments: Analysed with NAA by H. Mommsen: Group B
Bibliographic references: Schlotzhauer & Villing 2006 / East Greek Pottery from Naukratis: The Current State of Research (p.54, 56, 57 (fig. 1), Table 1)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 85-6, Nau 24, pl. 6a-b)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.579)
